snippet.title: Black Mesa: Blue Shift Chapters 1, 2 & 3 Playthrough (No Commentary)
snippet.description:
No commentary, blind playthrough of the excellent Half Life Blue Shift re-creation mod for Black Mesa. Awesome work from the guys at HECU Collective. 

Game link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/362890/Black_Mesa/
Mod link: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2424633574

0:00 Chapter 1 Living Quarters Outbound 
11:25 Chapter 2 Insecurity 
42:58 Chapter 3 Duty Calls

PC Specs: 

CPU: Liquid Cooled Intel i7-4820K Overclocked to 4.3GHz
GPU: EVGA RTX 2070 Super Black Edition Overclocked
RAM: 16GB Kingston HyperX Fury 1600MHz DDR3
STORAGE: 2x 240GB SSD, 1x 1TB HDD, 1x 2TB HDD
PSU: EVGA SuperNOVA 750W Bronze
